body.gatha1: Āyubbedo manubbedo, gandhabbo ceti te tayo;
body.gathalast: Gandhabbā gaṇikā ceva, dhanubbedā ca pūraṇā.
body.gatha1: Tikicchā itihāso ca, jotimāyā ca chandati;
body.gathalast: Ketumantā ca saddā ca, sippāṭṭhārasakā ime.
body.gatha1: Daṇḍena nīyate cedaṃ, daṇḍaṃ nayati vā puna;
body.paragraph: (1) Paṇḍitakaṇḍa. (2) Sujanakaṇḍa. (3) Bāladujjana kaṇḍa. (4) Mittakaṇḍa. (5) Itthikaṇḍa. (6) Rājakaṇḍa. (7) Pakiṇṇaka kaṇḍa-
body.gatha1: Paṇḍito sujano kaṇḍo, dujjano mittaitthī ca;
body.paragraph: (1) Paṇḍitakathā. (2) Sambhedakathā. (3) Mittakathā. (4) Nāyaka kathā. (5) Itthikathā
body.gathalast: Muttaṃ muttaṃ sudassanaṃ, vande bodhivaraṃ varaṃ.
body.gatha1: Nītidha jantūnaṃ sāro, mittācariyā ca pitaro;
body.paragraph: (1) Ācariyakathā (2) sippakathā (3) paññākathā (4) sutakathā (5) kathānakathā (6) dhanakathā (7) desakathā (8) nissayakathā (9) mittakathā (10) dujjanakathā (11) sujanakathā (12) balakathā (13) itthikathā (14) yuttakathā (15) dāsakathā (16) gharāvāsakathā (17) kātabbakathā (18) akātabbakathā (19) ñātabbakathā (20) alaṅkārakathā (21) rājadhammakathā (22) upasevakakathā (23) dukkhādimissakakathā (24) pakiṇṇakakathā
body.gathalast: Brahmāti brahmabrahmindo, jino pūretu me bhāvaṃ.
body.gatha1: Vanditvā ratanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, nissāya pubbake garu;
body.gathalast: Desañca nissayo mittaṃ, dujjano sujano balaṃ.
body.gatha1: Itthī putto ca dāso ca, gharāvāso katākato;
Sīhā ekaṃ bakā ekaṃ, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭā;
body.gathalast: Pañca kākā rājā nāma, cha sunakkhā tīṇi gadrabhā.
body.gatha1: Mahākammaṃ khuddakaṃ vā, yaṃ kammaṃ kātumicchati;
body.gathalast: Sabbārambhena kātabbaṃ, sīhā ekaṃ tadā bhave.
Thiyā akkamma bhuttañca, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭo.
Daḷhabhatti ca sūrañca, cha etesvānato guṇo.
body.gatha1: Khinnova vahate bhāraṃ, sītuṇhañca na cintayī;
body.gathalast: Santuṭṭho ca bhave niccaṃ, tīṇi sikkheyya gadrabhā.
body.gatha1: Vīsati tāni guṇāni, careyya iha paṇḍito;
body.gathalast: Vijeyya ripū sabbepi, tejassī so bhavissati.
body.paragraph: (1) Paṇḍitakaṇḍa (2) sujanakaṇḍa (3) bāladujjanakaṇḍa (4) mittakaṇḍa (5) rājakaṇḍa (6) nāyakakaṇḍa (7) puttakaṇḍa (8) vejjācariyakaṇḍa (9) dāsakakaṇḍa (10) itthikaṇḍa (11) pakiṇṇakakaṇḍa
